item.title: FD Mexican Pizza
item.description: 358 calories 1 tortilla 2 tablespoons passata 90g low fat mozzarella Then scatter with chopped vegetables [170g] Mushrooms, red pepper, courgette, red onion, aubergine and spinach all ok. Cook in a hot oven [gas mark 7] for 10 minutes, top shelf [at home!]
